content:

thought: I need to craft 4 gold_ingot. I have 4 nether_gold_ore, so I can smelt them to gold_ingot. I have 4 nether_gold_ore in slot 39, so I will smelt one of them to slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: Now I need to craft the netherite_ingot. To do that, I need to place 4 gold_ingot and 4 netherite_scrap in the crafting grid. I have 4 gold_ingot in slots 11, 12, 14, and 15, and 4 netherite_scrap in slot 23. I will start by moving the gold_ingot in slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
